title: [WORK] Ep. 68: 5 Steps To Be An Excellent Speaker w/ Carmine Gallo
description:
Does the thought of public speaking in front of an audience make you nervous?

This week Ash is joined by Carmine Gallo, an author, keynote speaker, and executive coach, to discuss the value of communication and how to improve your speaking skills.  Learn the 5 steps to stand out with your communication, whether in a work meeting, giving a presentation or persuading someone to believe in your idea.

In this quickly evolving world where the platform to share your ideas has grown, the power of persuasion is more important than ever.  Carmine and Ash reveal a three step set up to create memorable content and compelling speeches that will guarantee you make an impact.

Even with a perfect presentation prepared, one of the biggest things to overcome with public speaking is fear.  Learn how to reframe your thoughts and the power they have in making you a step up to speak with success.  Don’t forget to stick around for Ash’s post-episode notes to learn about the power of positive visualization and how it helped her prepare for TEDx!

 

In This Episode, You Will Learn:

  • What to remove immediately from all your presentation slides.
  • The power that storytelling has on communication.
  • Why you should be a learn-it-all, not a know-it-all.

 

Resources:

Five Stars by Carmine Gallo

Originals by Adam Grant

 

Where You Can Find Carmine Gallo:

www.carminegallo.com

www.thefivestarsbook.com
